title: Nakahara-kun no Kahogo na Imouto
original_name: 中原くんの過保護な妹
sinopse: Nakahara Yuusuke is a mediocre high school student, has a secret that he can't tell anyone—his sister Maria who is very overprotective. He took the chance of his admission to live separately from her, but after a year had passed Maria entered the same high school as him...
